title: PRICE DROP 7/29 Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear SGC 1

posts.post_title: PRICE DROP 7/29 Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear SGC 1
posts.post_content:
$3200 shipped and insured (within the US).  I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.

The red on this one is as deep and rich as I've seen.
